58 // Constructor/Destructor
59 
60 GuiDevice::GuiDevice(QWidget* parent, uint8_t type, string name, string uuid, unsigned long lastSeq, ros::Time lastSeen,
61  unsigned long heartbeat, map<string, Feature> features)
62  : QWidget(parent), Device(type, name, uuid, lastSeq, lastSeen, heartbeat, features)
63 {
64  // Define some standard values
65  connectbox_size = 10;
66  header_end = 30;
67  footer_height = 10;
68  line_height = 20;
69  line_start = connectbox_size;
70  this->features = GetSortedFeatures();
71  items = this->features.size();
72 
73  // Set the height of this widget to a fixed size
74  this->setMinimumHeight(header_end + line_height * items + footer_height);
75  this->setMaximumHeight(header_end + line_height * items + footer_height);
76 
77  // Prevent uninitialized usage of some member variables
78  footer_start = 0;
79  line_end = 0;
80  line_width = 0;
81 }
82 
83 GuiDevice::~GuiDevice()
84 {
85 }
86 
87 // Public member functions
88 
89 QPoint GuiDevice::FeatureBoxPosition(Tapi::Feature* feature)
90 {
91  int x, y, i;
92 
93  // Calculate y-coordinate (left end or right end of this widget, depending on the device type)
94  y = 0;
95  if (GetType() == tapi_lib::Device::Type_Subscriber)
96  x = 0;
97  else
98  x = this->width() - 1;
99 
100  // Calculate x-coordinate of the feature (middle of it) by searching from top to bottom through the features
101  i = 0;
102  for (auto it = features.begin(); it != features.end(); ++it)
103  {
104  if (*it == feature)
105  y = header_end + i * line_height + line_height / 2;
106  i++;
107  }
108  return QPoint(x, y);
109 }
110 
111 // Public member functions
112 QColor GuiDevice::stringToColor(string messagetype)
113 {
114  // Use MD5 method of Qt to calculate the MD5 of the given string
115  QCryptographicHash hasher(QCryptographicHash::Md5);
116  hasher.addData(messagetype.c_str());
117  QByteArray hash = hasher.result();
118 
119  // Take the first three bytes of the MD5 to generate the color
120  uint8_t red, green, blue;
121  red = hash.at(0);
122  green = hash.at(1);
123  blue = hash.at(2);
124  QColor color;
125  color = QColor(red, green, blue);
126  return color;
127 }
128 
129 void GuiDevice::Update(uint8_t type, string name, unsigned long lastSeq, ros::Time lastSeen, unsigned long heartbeat,
130  map<string, Feature> features)
131 {
132  // Update the Device object we are inheriting from and update our own alphabetically sorted features-vector
133  this->features.clear();
134  Device::Update(type, name, lastSeq, lastSeen, heartbeat, features);
135  this->features = GetSortedFeatures();
136  items = this->features.size();
137 
138  // Set the new height for this widget
139  this->setMinimumHeight(header_end + line_height * items + footer_height);
140  this->setMaximumHeight(header_end + line_height * items + footer_height);
141 }
142 
143 // Protected member functions
144 
145 void GuiDevice::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent* event)
146 {
147  // Check if the click happened to a feature, emit the featureClicked event then
148  int i = 0;
149  QPoint p = event->pos();
150  for (auto it = features.begin(); it != features.end(); ++it)
151  {
152  int y = header_end + i * line_height;
153 
154  if (p.y() >= y && p.y() < y + line_height)
155  {
156  emit featureClicked(this, *it);
157  }
158  i++;
159  }
160 }
161 
162 void GuiDevice::paintEvent(QPaintEvent*)
163 {
164  QPainter painter(this);
165 
166  // Calculate the necessary values for drawing from the size of this widget
167  footer_start = this->height() - footer_height;
168  line_width = this->width() - 2 * connectbox_size - 1;
169  line_end = line_start + line_width;
170 
171  // Draw main rectangle with round edges
172  if (Active())
173  painter.setBrush(Qt::white);
174  else
175  painter.setBrush(Qt::gray);
176  painter.setPen(Qt::black);
177  QSize a(line_width, this->height() - 1);
178  painter.drawRoundedRect(QRect(QPoint(line_start, 0), a), 10, 10);
179 
180  // Print heading
181  painter.setFont(QFont("Arial", 11));
182  painter.drawText(QRect(QPoint(line_start, 0), QPoint(line_end, header_end)), Qt::AlignCenter,
183  QString::fromStdString(GetName()));
184 
185  // Draw Features
186  int i = 0;
187  for (auto it = features.begin(); it != features.end(); ++it)
188  {
189  int line_y = header_end + i * line_height;
190 
191  QColor color;
192  color = stringToColor((*it)->GetType());
193  if (!Active())
194  color = color.darker();
195  painter.setBrush(color);
196 
197  painter.drawLine(QPoint(line_start, line_y), QPoint(line_end, line_y));
198 
199  // Draw connection box
200  QRect connect_box(QPoint(0, line_y + line_height / 2 - connectbox_size / 2),
201  QSize(connectbox_size, connectbox_size));
202 
203  if (GetType() == tapi_lib::Device::Type_Publisher)
204  connect_box.moveLeft(line_end);
205 
206  painter.drawRect(connect_box);
207 
208  // Draw the name of the feature
209  painter.setFont(QFont("Arial", 10));
210  painter.drawText(QRect(QPoint(line_start, line_y), QPoint(line_end, line_y + line_height)), Qt::AlignCenter,
211  QString::fromStdString((*it)->GetName()));
212  i++;
213  }
214 
215  // Draw footer
216  painter.drawLine(QPoint(line_start, footer_start), QPoint(line_end, footer_start));
217 }
218 }
